column2: Paralyzed hind legs, rapid breathing rate, no primary tumor
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
Skull was NOT in tact. A little bit of the melanoma extension was found outside of the skull cap.
Heart and lungs looked riddled with melanoma metastases upon visual inspection.
No cryogenics were taken due to lack of tumor
